item.title: Norwegian crown princess issues apology amid scrutiny of Epstein links
item.description: Norwegian crown princess issues apology to those she has 'disappointed' amid scrutiny of Epstein links

item.title: US strikes another alleged drug-trafficking boat in Eastern Pacific
item.description: The U.S. military says it has carried out another deadly strike on a vessel accused of trafficking drugs in the eastern Pacific Ocean

item.title: In Minnesota, sending a child to school is an act of faith for immigrant families
item.description: For many immigrant families in Minnesota, sending a child to school each day requires faith that one of the thousands of federal immigration officers ...

item.title: Ronald Hicks to be installed as 11th archbishop of New York
item.description: Ronald Hicks is set to be installed as the 11th archbishop of New York on Friday

item.title: Colorado funeral home owner faces sentencing for abusing 189 bodies
item.description: A Colorado funeral home owner who stashed 189 decomposing bodies and gave families fake ashes is set to be sentenced Friday
